mapper.select: select tw.w_title, tw.w_idx, twm.status_memo from t_work_mypage twm, t_work tw where twm.w_idx=(select w_idx from t_work tw where tw.user_id=#{user_id})
select tw.w_title, tw.w_idx, twm.status_idx from t_work_mypage twm, t_work tw where tw.exp_id=#{exp_id} and twm.exp_id=#{exp_id}
mapper.update: update t_work_mypage set status_memo=#{status_memo} where status_idx=#{status_idx}
